data.actual_result: Spotify Rich Presence keeps on going on when the Spotify client clearly says that the song is stopped.
data.expected_result: Spotify Rich Presence is supposed to be stopped when you stop the song on Spotify.
data.short_description: Discord shows the Spotify Rich Presence as playing when the song is not playing when you move around in VC.
